Docs.summary: Executed in the event a 401 response with a WWW-Authenticate authentication challenge header is received after the initial request.
Docs.returns: A boolean indicating whether the request was successfully authenticated and should be sent to the transport.
Docs.remarks: Service client libraries may override this to handle service specific authentication challenges.
